about.title: About Me
about.lead: A skillful IT Architect with over 17 years of experience as an Architect and Technical Lead.
description: With extensive expertise across Financial, Hotel, Manufacturing, Retail, and Telecommunication industries, I specialize in designing and implementing enterprise-scale solutions. My approach combines strong analytical thinking with a detail-oriented personality.

I possess excellent leadership and communication skills, with proven experience in working and communicating with international teams. I have a high passion for overcoming challenges and driving technological innovation.
